item.description: Wilson Mountain Reservation Wilson Mountain Reservation Dedham 617-333-7404 Open from dawn to dusk year round. Wilson Mountain was acquired in 1995. Its 213 Acres protect diverse wildlife habitat and important recreational open space. The property provides panoramic views of Boston and the Blue Hills and is the largest remaining piece of open space in Dedham. Directions By Car: Off of Route 128/95, Exit 17, Route 135. Head towards Dedham. Parking lot 1/2 mile on right.
item.why: Just a suggestion due to the amount of snow on the ground if you have snow shoes or stabilicers it would be a good idea to bring them. Although the trails have been groomed it will add to the experience if you have this additional equipment

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group
